Thanks for pointing out that I can exclude these tests from the
testsuites for the "other" platforms.

My testcases will be stored in a code repository and may be accessed
by a wide range of users elsewhere in development, test, and field
support communities.

I was thinking that someone else might take the single testclass
(potentially one of many) intended only for Windows and try to run it
standalone on another platform, but I guess this boils down to a
question of documenting the testcases properly including valid runtime
environments.
Roger
